doc:
John Beradino https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Beradino 0 John Beradino (born Giovanni Berardino, May 1, 1917 – May 19, 1996) was an American infielder in Major League Baseball and an actor. Known as Johnny Berardino during his baseball career, he was also credited during his acting career as John Berardino, John Baradino, John Barardino or John Barradino. John_Beradino ( born Giovanni_Berardino , May_1_,_1917 – May_19_,_1996 ) was an_American_infielder in Major_League_Baseball and an_actor . Known as Johnny_Berardino during his_baseball_career , he was_also_credited during his_acting_career as John_Berardino , John_Baradino , John_Barardino or John_Barradino .
